heritage.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society
heritage.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the importance of preserving the national heritage
beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
heritage.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a heritage vegetable or plant is one of a kind that was first grown many years ago, and has now become rare or unusual
heritage.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We grow heritage varieties of vegetables.
